description.text: Your unarmed strikes are as precise as they are powerful, but they leave you open and you can pursue foes with blinding speed.

sections.Benefit: While using the Tiger Style feat, you can apply the penalty from Power Attack to your AC instead of attack rolls. Additionally, once per round as a swift action, you can move up to half your speed closer to a target you hit with an unarmed strike or made a successful combat maneuver against on this turn or your last turn.
